text: Hugh Robertson Anderson (born 18 January 1936) is a former New Zealand motorcyclist. He is a four-time Grand Prix motorcycle road racing World Champion and a 19-time New Zealand national champion. He is also a two-time Isle of Man TT winner. In 1995, he was added into the New Zealand Sports Hall of Fame. Anderson was born in Auckland. He spent his early years in Huntly. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Order of the British Empire Category:New Zealand motorcycle racers Category:Sportspeople from Auckland
title: Hugh Anderson (motorcyclist)
